name: Alter Cosmos (itch)
description:
We are game development studio located in Lublin, Poland, City of Inspiration :) We create cutting-edge games for PC, mobile and web. Our team is a mix of developers, artists, designers and gamedev passionates. We love creating games we want to play.

GAME OVER IS JUST THE BEGINNING...

There is a comic book adaptation in the works which expands the Alter Cosmos world with new plots, characters and locations. This project is a beginning of a new adventure. And with your support we can make that happen!
